title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus does not change and there is no indicator to show that it has received focus.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret should be visible in the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. 
2. Click on the first Combo labeled 'Host:'. 
3. Observe that the focus does not change and there is no indication that the first Combo has received focus.
